titleStmt.title: Love's letters, his and hers, to each other, a little before his death.
titleStmt.author: Love, Mary, 17th cent.
Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

notesStmt.note: A letter from Mrs. Love to her husband, and his reply, dated 11 July and 22 August 1651, respectively.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
